medium:
Yao-chou ware (Northern celadon)
Porcelaneous stoneware with carved and incised lotus decor under green glaze
title: Tea Bowl
description: Bowl, celadon, conical, straight-sided, on small circular foot. The inside is decorated with an all-over floral design and the outside with a pattern of carved petals. Thinly potted with luminous olive-green glaze.
